title: Save an extra 20% on Rosetta Stone and StackSkills Unlimited and enrich your mind for life
content:
Macworld

Learning consistently enriches your life and opens the way for greater opportunities. Now, you can enjoy a comprehensive education with the Unlimited Lifetime Learning Bundle, which features access to Rosetta Stone and StackSkills Unlimited at an additional 20% discount through March 10.

The bundle kicks off with a lifetime subscription to Rosetta Stone, which was awarded PCMag’s Editors’ Choice Award five years in a row. Hailed as one of the most refined language learning apps available, new subscribers gain full access to learning materials across all 25 languages offered.

Rosetta Stone offers an immersive language learning experience, focusing on building conversational language skills. Learn how to order food, hail a cab, and much more, and perfect your accent with Rosetta Stone’s proprietary speech recognition technology, TruAccent™, which can provide instantaneous feedback to improve your pronunciation.

You’ll additionally get lifetime access to StackSkills Unlimited, a digital educational platform featuring over 1,000 courses on topics like finance, graphic design, personal wellness, and much more. Users can access courses at their convenience and learn from over 350 of the web’s top instructors. With StackSkills Unlimited, you can gain the skills and knowledge needed for professional growth, a new career, or to expand your horizons.

Engage in lifelong education with lifetime access to Rosetta Stone and StackSkills Unlimited for just $151.99 with code ENJOY20. Offer ends March 10 at 11:59 PM Pacific!
